JOB DESCRIPTION: At SenseAble, we are dedicated to developing the next generation of smart systems with one goal in mind: To be a global leader in bleeding edge smart solutions.   We are looking for a Full stack developer with experience in AngularJS, Bootstrap and Java. The applicant should also have experience in MySQL.    Role Overview  :    Design and develop a dashboard for our clients operations teams   Create graphs and other UI components as per user requirements   Working with our DBA to understand the data and performing basic functions   Coding the services layer to integrate with third party data providers   Integrating with 3rd party vendor APIs     Job Qualifications  :    3 - 4 years of experience in software development   Ability to work in teams and drive work to completion   Experience working in angular JS and Java   Experience in REST/SOAP based services
